synopsis:
Three children pilots fight against the Dark Empire on their mission to destroy the universe.

This film was edited with footage from Savior of the Earth, Defenders of Space - Phoenix-bot Phoenix King, King Robot, Protectors of Universe - Super Express Mazinger 7, Solar Adventure, Space Transformers - Micro-Commando Diatron-5, Super Mazinger 3 and Iron Man Trio. All the aforementioned movies also ripoff other anime like Mazinger Z (and all but the last were separately dubbed by Joseph Lai as well). 

(Source: IMDB, Tropedia (edited))
